page.title: 16Welcome Hall,Trimley
page.content: The only public hall in our block is the Welcome Hall,Trimley. It was given to the villages by a landowner, Mr.Pretyman of Orwell Park,about eighty years ago. The Hall is run by trustees representing many village organisations. The Hall is used for weddings and other private parties, but mainly for regular meetings of clubs and groups. These include the Welcome Playgroup, the Mothers and Toddlers group,Weight Watchers,the Over 60s Club, the Mothers Union and both the Women's Institutes. The local Health Authority use the hall for Health Clinics,the church holds a Sunday School there and Felixstowe Musical Theatre rehearses there each week. St.Mary's Parish Council would like to see another,larger hall built,but cannot find a suitable site.
